pullrequest.title: issue #1144 fix inertia ratio reduction error with hardcoded ratio limit. check for violation of line criterion. added test.

content.raw: I have a refactored version of this code in [branch irr_debug_1.9_scpeters](#!/osrf/gazebo/branches/compare/irr_debug_1.9_scpeters..gazebo_1.9#diff). It is quite a bit more concise, though it doesn't iterate over the desired inertia ratio. I've been discussing this with @hsu offline. Please don't merge until we've sorted things out.
content.html: I have a refactored version of this code in branch irr_debug_1.9_scpeters. It is quite a bit more concise, though it doesn't iterate over the desired inertia ratio. I've been discussing this with @hsu offline. Please don't merge until we've sorted things out.
